item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

[quote=“xray5, post:28, topic:368271”]ok i copied everything u did and got this. I didn’t know where to put the public int startersfail = 0;public long beginners = 0;

================================================================================

                           YOUR ERROR"S

================================================================================
client.java:21161: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable other
location: class client
if(other.startersfail <= 29){
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .
ok the picture is of where i put the int tell me where it should be please im a newbie :|[/quote]

it didnt say the error was “startersfail”
it said the error was “other”

could be something like this

    client other = getClient(trade_reqId);

placed the line right above this

                if(other.startersfail <= 29){

Read full topic

item.title: [TuT] [ 317 ] How to prevent Starters from Trading or Droping! [ DELTA ] ! [TuT]
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

[quote=“dutchboy, post:18, topic:368271”]u did a small part wrong, resulting in reset of timer on relog:
this:

characterfile.write("character-startersfail = ", 0, 19);
shud be this:

characterfile.write("character-startersfail = ", 0, 25);

otherwise the server can’t save the timer correctly :\

That last number is VERY important, if you do it wrong, it could reset all your players.[/quote]
Oh this… didin’t notice this mistake, thx.

Read full topic
item.source: [TuT] [ 317 ] How to prevent Starters from Trading or Droping! [ DELTA ] ! [TuT]

item.title: [TuT] [ 317 ] How to prevent Starters from Trading or Droping! [ DELTA ] ! [TuT]
item.dc:creator: @dutchboy dutchboy
item.description:
@dutchboy wrote:

u did a small part wrong, resulting in reset of timer on relog:
this:

characterfile.write("character-startersfail = ", 0, 19);
shud be this:

characterfile.write("character-startersfail = ", 0, 25);

otherwise the server can’t save the timer correctly :\

That last number is VERY important, if you do it wrong, it could reset all your players.

Read full topic
item.source: [TuT] [ 317 ] How to prevent Starters from Trading or Droping! [ DELTA ] ! [TuT]

item.title: [TuT] [ 317 ] How to prevent Starters from Trading or Droping! [ DELTA ] ! [TuT]
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:11, topic:368271”][quote author=Dastan_ link=topic=464422.msg3398000#msg3398000 date=1289654167]

Very nice.
[/quote][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=464422.msg3397978#msg3397978 date=1289648986]
nice tut it will help lots of new coders

Thanks.

Totaly true

i dont find a reason for this, why prevent starters trading or droping?

You dont find a reason?

Lemme give you one.

Without this, players can trade or drop items at the very second as they create an account , right?

So, every server has starters money set to ~500k.

Image If i could create 10 accounts in less than a minute , and swap those 5M into one account in a minute.

Wouldn’t be fun now would it?

Whole economy would go to waste.

So by using this tutorial you can do it so starters couldn’t trade or drop for hours/days.

Get it now?
[/quote]EXACTLY![/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: [TuT] [ 317 ] How to prevent Starters from Trading or Droping! [ DELTA ] ! [TuT]

i dont find a reason for this, why prevent starters trading or droping?

You dont find a reason?

Lemme give you one.

Without this, players can trade or drop items at the very second as they create an account , right?

So, every server has starters money set to ~500k.

Image If i could create 10 accounts in less than a minute , and swap those 5M into one account in a minute.

Wouldn’t be fun now would it?

Whole economy would go to waste.

So by using this tutorial you can do it so starters couldn’t trade or drop for hours/days.

Get it now?
